data.title: Ocean City Maryland Oceanfront Hotels
data.meta_description: We are your ultimate destination for a memorable beach vacation in Ocean City, MD. With direct access to the pristine sandy beach & breathtaking ocean views.
data.text:
We are excited to announce a special breakfast package offer exclusively for our loyal guests.

Enjoy a delightful breakfast for up to 4 people, included in this rate plan!

Stay for a minimum of 2 nights between Sunday and Wednesday, and get Traditional American Breakfast daily for up to 4 people.

Weekdays only, 2-night minimum. Direct bookings only.

Book rate plan “ENDLESS SUMMER BREAKFAST FAVORITES“

Make nights at the Princess Royale Oceanfront Resort even more rewarding. You’ll earn points for every stay when you join our loyalty program , Stash Hotel Rewards. The Stash Network includes hundreds of amazing independent hotels so you can collect points all across North America. Points never expire, so redeem them when you’re ready.

Start earning free nights, fast. Book Direct!

It’s the free and easy loyalty program for travelers who love independent and boutique hotels.

Join now!

Take a leisurely stroll along the coast, explore unique finds in our boutique, or spend the day relaxing poolside in our lush 4-story tropical atrium. Enjoy fun and games in our atrium arcade, and stay active in our state-of-the-art fitness center. Indulge in our rejuvenating treatment at our award-winning spa and later, enjoy a delightful meal at one of our restaurants. End your day with your favorite cocktail, reflecting on the days adventures. Wake up and savor delightful treats and fresh brewed coffee at Royale Roasters.

VIEW OUR AMENITIES

Join us for a culinary adventure! Indulge in mouth-watering steaks, crab cakes, small plates, desserts, and more that will leave your taste buds begging for more.

Start your day with a delicious breakfast at Schooners Restaurant, and savor a delightful lunch or dinner at The Current Oceanfront Bar & Grille. Whether you prefer quick and casual dining, a romantic date night, a fun evening out with friends and family, or hosting your conference or special event banquets, we have the perfect meal for every occasion.

VIEW OUR DINING OPTIONS
